meaningMnemonic: The <radical>old</radical> <radical>winter</radical> is to blame for today's <kanji>circumstance</kanji>. It is the <kanji>reason</kanji> things are bad now.
readingMnemonic: In reality, this <kanji>circumstance</kanji> was actually caused by a single <reading>子</reading> (こ), though. This kid went through town, destroying everything in their path.
